text: Ľudmila Maťavková (born 11 April 1998) is a Slovak footballer who plays as a midfielder for Royal Charleroi Sporting Club in the Belgian Women's Super League. She played before in the Czech First Division for the 1. FC Slovácko Ženy and for the Slovan Bratislava in the Slovak Women's First League. She plays for the Slovakia women's national team. ==Career== Maťavková has been capped for the Slovakia national team, appearing for the team during the 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup qualifying cycle. On 1 July 2020, Maťavková signed with Charleroi and made her debut on 16 July 2020. She scored the first goal in the history of the club's women's team in the match. ==Honours== Winner * Slovak leagues : 2019, 2020 ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Slovak women's footballers Category:Slovakia women's international footballers Category:Women's association football midfielders Category:ŠK Slovan Bratislava (women) players Category:1. title: Ľudmila Maťavková
